response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by our previous customers. Given its quality and features, it's worth more than $100 to us. Considering its value and the fact that it would be a great addition to your collection, we're offering it to you for $120. This price reflects both the cost of production and our desire to ensure you receive a high-quality item at a fair price. We believe this is an excellent opportunity for you to experience the benefits of our product without breaking the bank. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 120}
